definitions.text: extended verbal expression in speech or writing
an address of a religious nature (usually delivered during a church service)
an extended communication (often interactive) dealing with some particular topic
examples: the book contains an excellent discussion of modal logic
his treatment of the race question is badly biased

definitions.text: to consider or examine in speech or writing
examples: The author talks about the different aspects of this question

definitions.text: talk at length and formally about a topic
examples: The speaker dissertated about the social politics in 18th century England
